text: allh hu aladhi jaeal alshams dya', wajaeal alqamar nwrana, wqddar alqamar mnazl, fbalshms taerif alayam, wbalqmr taerif alshuhur walaewam, ma khalaq allah taealaa alshams walqamar 'iilaa lhkmt ezymt, wdlalt ealaa kamal qudrat allah welmh, ybyin alhujaj waladlt liqawm yaelamun alhikmat fi 'iibdae alkhlq
